description: Doesn't seem to be currently working in this version of Ubuntu
I was not able to get this to work with Mycroft install from snap

I have got Mycroft to work somewhat. 

It responds to a wake word, but randomly wakes up from me typing on my keyboard

The only feature which works is telling the time and setting alarms. Disappointingly the UI element in the taskbar is broken.

I'm really pleased that something like this has come to the open source community, even if it cant really do much useful at the moment.

Thanks

summary: does not work at all do not download

description: Mycroft works, but this extension doesn't. Why isn't it just taken off the extension site instead of leading the ignorant to download it and then waste their time Googling solutions, only to be told that it doesn't work?
Doesn't work for recent (2019+) setups and all signs show the extension is no longer maintained.
